title: Doctor Shares His Experience of Sri Narasimha Jayanti and Spiritual Journey with ISKCON Bangalore
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.text: and today I witnessed the most beautiful Abhisheka I could have ever witnessed
the whole environment was so powerful and for a for my profession where I only hear
about disease and pain and suffering I for a while was feeling completely out of any
miserable situation and pain and it was a wonderful experience if gone Bangalore has
not only stood strong it has been the guiding force I have been coming to temple from last
and every single day has been a new energy for me for my profession
I thank ISKCON Bangalore for giving me this wonderful opportunity to be a part
of this celebration thank you so much
